text: Prthiraita yisakale an'yayabharae ahankara karai phurae sihamtaka ma'i mora nidarsanasamuhara paraa niscaya amtarata raakhima. Daraacalate sihamte pratito nidarsana dekhile'o imana posana nakaraiba arau sihamte satpatha dekhile'o se'itoka patha buli grahana nakaraiba, kintu sihamte bhula patha dekhile se'itoka patha buli grahana karaiba. E'ito e'i babe ye, sihamte amara nidarsanasamuhaka asbikara karaiche arau se'i samparke sihamta achila amanoyogi
